summary:
Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) is a top French football club based in Paris. They have won many titles, including 12 league championships and a European cup. The team plays at Parc des Princes stadium.

Founded in 1970, PSG had early success, winning the French Cup in 1982. The 1990s brought more wins, including the UEFA Cup Winners' Cup. After a dip in the 2000s, Qatar Sports Investments took over in 2011, bringing new success. PSG now dominates French football and regularly competes in the UEFA Champions League.

With a global fan base, PSG is one of the world's most valuable football clubs.
title: Paris Saint-Germain FC
